channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Numerous potholes along Swindon lane, 23rd January
item.description:
Condition of road along Swindon lane between racecourse roundabout and junction with Tommy taylorâ€™s lane is bad. Numerous potholes of various sizes along the kerb and into the road down both lanes of traffic
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Cleevelands Drive, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep 30x60cm pothole danger to cyclists, 23rd January
item.description:
There is a large pothole in the middle of the road, which is a danger to cyclists with copious amounts of loose gravel surrounding causing a skid risk. There are multiple other smaller potholes surrounding this.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Birch Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole before junction to Evesham road, 23rd January
item.description:
Significant pothole just before exit of Cleevelands Drive onto Evesham Road junction. Only entrance/exit to cleevelands estate. One larger pothole towards centre of the lane with tarmac crumbling around it. Deteriorated in the last few days presumably because of the weather conditions
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Cleevelands Drive, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tarmac has crumbled away to reveal full strata of road surface., 23rd January
item.description:
Diagonally opposite Hunters Road, near un-named pedestrian entrance to housing estate.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Bramble Chase, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 23rd January
item.description:
Previous repair looks like it has now failed and there is a substantial pothole. The pothole is around 200 x 200 and 80 deep. Noticeably bigger over the last week or so. It was upto the ankle of the customer foot. They also mention some other issues starting to appear in the area.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple deep pot holes over both double roundabouts, 23rd January
Tree is damaged problem, 23rd January
item.description:
Thank you in advance for your attention to this matter Alas, time is now running out before the old beech tree comes down. The attached photos highlight the large cracks in the upper trunk. Fungi rotting the base isn't helping either. However, communication with officialdom has shown nil results to date. It seems public safety is not high on the agenda. Decisions need to be made and action taken now to avert dangerous consequences. Worst case scenario loss of life.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pot hole, 23rd January
item.description:
Large pot hole. several more have appeared in the middle of road futher down towards sailsbury avenue

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Woodlands Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 23rd January
item.description:
